SELECT AAD.ACCT_ID, XACCT.ALIAS_ID ACCT_ALIAS_ID, AAD.SIGNER_ACCT_ID, XSIGNER.ALIAS_ID SIGNER_ALIAS_ID, AAD.AGREEMENT_CODE, AAD.BEGIN_DATE, AAD.END_DATE, AAD.ROW_USER_ID, AAD.ROW_MODIFY_DATE FROM I_ACCT_TO_AGREEMENT AAD, I_ACCT_XREF XACCT, I_ACCT_XREF XSIGNER, ( SELECT ACCT_ID, SIGNER_ACCT_ID, MAX (END_DATE) END_DATE FROM I_ACCT_TO_AGREEMENT AA WHERE AA.AGREEMENT_CODE = #agrCode#
AA.ACCT_ID = #acctId#
AA.SIGNER_ACCT_ID = #signerAcctId#
GROUP BY ACCT_ID, SIGNER_ACCT_ID) AAMAX WHERE AAD.ACCT_ID = XACCT.ACCT_ID AND XACCT.SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE= #systemTypeCode# AND XACCT.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' AND AAD.SIGNER_ACCT_ID = XSIGNER.ACCT_ID AND XSIGNER.SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE=#systemTypeCode# AND XSIGNER.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' AND AAD.AGREEMENT_CODE = #agrCode# AND AAD.ACCT_ID = AAMAX.ACCT_ID AND AAD.SIGNER_ACCT_ID = AAMAX.SIGNER_ACCT_ID AND AAD.END_DATE = AAMAX.END_DATE

AA.ACCT_ID = #acctId#

sqlMap.update: UPDATE I_ACCT_TO_AGREEMENT SET END_DATE = #endDate#, ROW_MODIFY_DATE = #rowModifyDate#, ROW_USER_ID = #rowUserId#, ROW_TASK_ID = #rowTaskId# WHERE ACCT_ID = #accountId# AND AGREEMENT_CODE = #agreementCode# AND END_DATE > SYSDATE
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT AA.AGREEMENT_CODE, A.SDESCR AGREEMENT_DESCR, A.COMMERCIAL_AGREEMENT, A.CORN_AGREEMENT_FLAG, A.SOYBEAN_AGREEMENT_FLAG, A.MONSANTO_TRAIT_AGREEMENT FROM I_AGREEMENT A, I_ACCT_TO_AGREEMENT AA WHERE A.END_DATE >= SYSDATE AND AA.END_DATE >= SYSDATE AND A.BEGIN_DATE <= SYSDATE AND AA.BEGIN_DATE <= SYSDATE AND A.LICENSED_BY_CODE = #licensedBy# AND AA.ACCT_ID = #accountId# AND AA.AGREEMENT_CODE = A.AGREEMENT_CODE AND (A.COMMERCIAL_AGREEMENT IS NOT NULL OR A.MONSANTO_TRAIT_AGREEMENT IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY AA.AGREEMENT_CODE
